“Alien” Theatrical & Director’s Cut Comparison

This is a shot-by-shot comparison between the theatrical and director’s cut of the movie. You can explore the matching, moved and deleted fragments on the timeline chart below.

View other comparisons for other movies.

Theatrical cut length 1 h. 56 min.
Director’s cut length 1 h. 55 min.
Added in director’s cut 16 min. 27 sec.
Moved 0 sec.


Matching fragment
Moved fragment
Fragment present only in one of the versions
Current movie position

Clicking on a fragment starts video playback from the beginning of the fragment.
Theatrical cut
Director’s cut
Note: On first fragment click the playback of the two videos might not begin simultaneously due to videos being loaded. Following clicks usually start the playback more precisely.
02 Oct 2018

Shot-by-Shot Movie Version Comparison
Some movies are released in two or more versions. We propose an algorithm for fully automatic construction of an editing map of two movie versions.
